title: [Bug]: About dialogue shows unreadable font / characters
body:
### Can you reproduce this bug in the website/PWA?

Yes

### Describe the bug

in taskbar click "About" then the about dialog opens - see screenshot

### What package are you using?

deb

### Version

1.14.0

### Reproduction steps

```markdown
see above
```

### Expected Behavior

```markdown
shall be readable
```

### Debug

```markdown

```
